resources.string: In order to view PDF files, a PDF reader must be installed on your device.
Whatever you just did was a success. Apparently we felt the need to show a dialog instead of a snackbar or toast message. Congratulations on this overkill message!
Whatever you just did was a complete failure. Apparently we felt the need to show a dialog instead of a snackbar or toast message. Congratulations on this overkill message!
There was an error verifying your credentials.

The password for your account is missing. Once you have entered and logged in for the first time you will be able to use the fingerprint functionality.\n\n Note: Make sure to keep \"Use Fingerprint Authentication\" enabled when logging in.

The username for your account is missing. Once you have entered and logged in for the first time you will be able to use the fingerprint functionality.\n\n Note: Make sure to keep \"Use Fingerprint Authentication\" enabled when logging in.
